list.name: Changes
list.comment:
chore: Work summary for 23-25.05.2025 for TripNest
‚ú® HTML refactor & adaptive layout blitz! ‚ú® - Refactored all HTML files and brought page structure to current standards üîÑ - Massive overhaul of adaptive CSS: now every page looks sharp on desktop, tablet, and mobile üñ•Ô∏èüì± - Polished and unified card styles for hotels, excursions, and tickets ‚ú® - Redesigned calendar: updated color scheme and improved date selection UX üìÖ - Fixed burger menu positioning and header pinning across all device types üçî - Set up links for restaurants and food ordering (coming soon pages) üçΩÔ∏è - Began hosting setup: domain registered, deployment started, config in progress üåê - Miscellaneous UI fixes and final touches everywhere üõ†Ô∏è
üõ†Ô∏è Up next: - Booking calendar integration for all user reservations - Filtering improvements and full bookings history display - Finish website deployment and domain linking - Final mobile and tablet responsive tweaks
Closes: ~98,5% of coursework milestones for TripNest üöÄ

task.summary:
Initial commit of TripNest project
- Set up Django project structure with virtual environment - Created base apps: trip (home), user (auth/profile), transport, hotel_booking, excursion_booking, etc. - Configured MySQL database and settings.py - Implemented custom user model with extended Profile (passport, driver license, phone, etc.) - Added user authentication (registration, login, logout) - Created templates for home (guest and logged in), profile, login, registration - Added static and media file handling - Set up custom admin panel with user/role management - Implemented responsive design and basic CSS theme - Connected email service for password reset - Prepared models and CRUD interfaces for hotel rooms and excursions
TripNest ‚Äî multi-functional travel assistant with booking, transport, and profile management

Initial commit of TripNest project
- Set up Django project structure with virtual environment - Created base apps: trip (home), user (auth/profile), transport, hotel_booking, excursion_booking, etc. - Configured MySQL database and settings.py - Implemented custom user model with extended Profile (passport, driver license, phone, etc.) - Added user authentication (registration, login, logout) - Created templates for home (guest and logged in), profile, login, registration - Added static and media file handling - Set up custom admin panel with user/role management - Implemented responsive design and basic CSS theme - Connected email service for password reset - Prepared models and CRUD interfaces for hotel rooms and excursions
TripNest ‚Äî multi-functional travel assistant with booking, transport, and profile management

Initial commit of TripNest project
- Set up Django project structure with virtual environment - Created base apps: trip (home), user (auth/profile), transport, hotel_booking, excursion_booking, etc. - Configured MySQL database and settings.py - Implemented custom user model with extended Profile (passport, driver license, phone, etc.) - Added user authentication (registration, login, logout) - Created templates for home (guest and logged in), profile, login, registration - Added static and media file handling - Set up custom admin panel with user/role management - Implemented responsive design and basic CSS theme - Connected email service for password reset - Prepared models and CRUD interfaces for hotel rooms and excursions
TripNest ‚Äî multi-functional travel assistant with booking, transport, and profile management

Initial commit of TripNest project
- Set up Django project structure with virtual environment - Created base apps: trip (home), user (auth/profile), transport, hotel_booking, excursion_booking, etc. - Configured MySQL database and settings.py - Implemented custom user model with extended Profile (passport, driver license, phone, etc.) - Added user authentication (registration, login, logout) - Created templates for home (guest and logged in), profile, login, registration - Added static and media file handling - Set up custom admin panel with user/role management - Implemented responsive design and basic CSS theme - Connected email service for password reset - Prepared models and CRUD interfaces for hotel rooms and excursions
TripNest ‚Äî multi-functional travel assistant with booking, transport, and profile management

Improve link stability and namespace consistency
- Correct URL namespaces across all routing configurations - Updated `{% url %}` tags in admin panel and site templates to use proper namespaces - Fixed numerous NoReverseMatch errors by aligning route names and patterns - Refactored `urlpatterns` order for precise matching and prevent unintended overrides - Ensured all custom admin_panel links resolve to the intended CRUD views

Improve link stability and namespace consistency
- Correct URL namespaces across all routing configurations - Updated `{% url %}` tags in admin panel and site templates to use proper namespaces - Fixed numerous NoReverseMatch errors by aligning route names and patterns - Refactored `urlpatterns` order for precise matching and prevent unintended overrides - Ensured all custom admin_panel links resolve to the intended CRUD views

Improve link stability and namespace consistency
- Correct URL namespaces across all routing configurations - Updated `{% url %}` tags in admin panel and site templates to use proper namespaces - Fixed numerous NoReverseMatch errors by aligning route names and patterns - Refactored `urlpatterns` order for precise matching and prevent unintended overrides - Ensured all custom admin_panel links resolve to the intended CRUD views

- Implemented adding hotel rooms to the cart (DraftBooking) - Extended BookingItem model to support hotel_room field - Created add_room_to_cart view with RoomInventory availability check - Updated room_class_detail.html: added booking form with check-in/check-out - Updated cart.html to display hotel rooms - Enhanced cart_view with select_related for hotel_room and excursion - Extended BookingItem model to support excursions - Implemented add_excursion_to_cart view and form on excursion_detail.html - Fully updated cart.html to support display of hotel rooms, excursions, and flight tickets - Performed shell-based debugging to verify DraftBooking item saving
I redid the excursions, finished everything with the basket, I'm starting with the train tickets

chore: Work summary for 21.05.2025 for TripNest
‚Ä¢ Shopping Cart ‚Äì Completed adding flight tickets to the cart ‚Äì Implemented adding hotel room bookings ‚Äì Added excursions to the cart
‚Ä¢ Admin Panel ‚Äì Fixed display and order management issues ‚Äì Improved field validation and access control handling
‚Ä¢ Trains ‚Äì Started implementing train ticket purchases ‚Äì Designed and fleshed out the basic structure of train modules
Closes: 94/100% for coursework

chore: Work summary for 22.05.2025 for TripNest Admin panel overhaul & ticket generation madness! - Fixed hotel editing in admin panel ‚Äì photo updates now work like a charm - Fully implemented train system structure with auto-ticket generation on schedule
Up next: 1. Finalize booking process flow 2. Display available spots for excursions 3. Show free room counts per class in hotels 4. UI polish & responsive tuning for mobile and tablet devices
Closes: 97/100% for coursework
